page.title: 16RECREATION 2
page.content: Watersmeet Centre, in the High Street with adjacent parking, is a small theatre. It can hold 481 people and has room for a limited number of wheelchairs. The Chess restaurant is in the same building.Plays, musicals and films are all shown there and Discos are held for the under 18s.The Rickmansworth Players, the Pinner and Hatch End Opera Society, the Harrow Light Opera Company and the Three Rivers Music Society are only a few of the amateur societies which perform there.The programme is varied to appeal to all age groups because Watersmeet is a family theatre. There is a Hockey Club, a Football Club and a tennis club with twelve courts, three of which are floodlit. The William Penn Swimming Pool,owned by the Three Rivers Council, has a club for coaching and life saving.
